title: LCS/Worlds advertising
body: I have been wondering this for a while, When broadcasting professional League completions, such as worlds or the LCS, why doesn't riot use the time in between games or even reserve parts of the spectator client for 3rd party advertising.  I'm not talking big obnoxious ads, but in between games on twitch where only a list of upcoming games come up, or in the bottom corner of their broadcast where the is just a blank grey square. It would obviously make them money which in turn i would assume would help them improve on the game. A competition as big as worlds has such a high viewer base, it seems like a wasted opportunity

replies.body: yes but eventually people will complain about the ads, the funds could help improve the game but then again, like they say quality over quantity, in this case league is a very well worth playing game
